page.title: 16 EMPLOYMENT IN NORTHAMPTON
page.content: In days such as these, Northampton is not without its unemployment problem with figures surging into the nine thousands. Northampton became part of a development scheme in the late l960's and since then has attracted many people from London's overspill, which has meant that more jobs had to be created and this is why places like Brackmills and Moulton Park came into being.These areas contain large firms like Telfers and M.F.I. Such firms need an increasing number of staff, thus helping to serve Northampton's employment requirements. The signs are therefore very encouraging in Northampton with its large supermarkets shopping centres and industrial estates providing much needed employment.
